meanings.definition: The act of publishing something again.
meanings.sent1: Libraries often have republications of classic books for readers to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: The library's collection includes many republications of famous novels.
meanings.sent3: I found a republications of my favorite book with a new cover design.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like a republications of old ideas, presented in a fresh way.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's lesson was a republications of the previous day's material, helping students review.

meanings.definition: A publication that is a republication.
meanings.sent1: The bookstore had a section dedicated to republications of classic literature.
meanings.sent2: I bought a republications of a magazine that featured an article I missed.
meanings.sent3: The republications of the newspaper included a special section on local events.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of republications showcased the best works of various authors.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed a republications of an ancient manuscript for visitors to see.
